div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DeviceUsage|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `DeviceUsage` is representable via FHIR R4B Resource `DeviceUseStatement`. Element `DeviceUsage` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.meta`.
Element `DeviceUsage.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.implicitRules`.
Element `DeviceUsage.language` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.language`.
Element `DeviceUsage.text` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.text`.
Element `DeviceUsage.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.contained`.
Element `DeviceUsage.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.identifier`.
Element `DeviceUsage.basedOn` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.basedOn`.
Element `DeviceUsage.basedOn` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.

Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `DeviceUsage.status` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.status`.
Element `DeviceUsage.status` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.category` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.patient` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.subject`.
Element `DeviceUsage.derivedFrom` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.derivedFrom`.
Element `DeviceUsage.derivedFrom` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.context` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.

Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.timing[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DeviceUseStatement`. Element `DeviceUsage.timing[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.timing[x]`. Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.timing[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage.dateAsserted` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.recordedOn`.
Element `DeviceUsage.usageStatus` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.usageReason` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.adherence` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.

Element `DeviceUsage.adherence.code` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceUsage.adherence` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DeviceUsage.adherence.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.

Element `DeviceUsage.adherence.reason` is part of an existing definition because parent element `DeviceUsage.adherence` requires a cross-version extension. Element `DeviceUsage.adherence.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.informationSource` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.source`.
Element `DeviceUsage.informationSource` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.device` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.device`.
Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.reasonCode`. Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.reasonReference`.
Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.reasonCode`. Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.reasonReference`.

Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `DeviceUseStatement.indication`. Element `DeviceUsage.reason` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `DeviceUseStatement`, but has no target element specified.
Element `DeviceUsage.bodySite` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.bodySite`.

Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.bodySite[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DeviceUseStatement`. Element `DeviceUsage.bodySite` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `DeviceUseStatement.bodySite[x]`. Note that the target element context `DeviceUseStatement.bodySite[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DeviceUseStatement`.
Element `DeviceUsage.note` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `DeviceUseStatement.note`.
Element `DeviceUsage.note` is mapped to FHIR DSTU2 element `DeviceUseStatement.notes`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
